title: IT: access request → approval → provisioning
description: AI proposes access level, the IT manager approves or overrides, and provisioning pauses until sign-off. Every request, approval, and change is logged.

title: HR: policy question → source doc → answer + citation
description: Route HR questions to approved sources and return cited answers that reduce repeat follow-ups.

title: Ops: vendor onboarding checklist
description: Guide intake, collect required documents, and route approvals with a logged checklist.

title: Legal: intake triage + escalation
description: AI classifies the request, pauses on policy exceptions, and escalates to named counsel for approval. The classification, escalation, and final decision are logged.

title: CRM intake and routing in a microcosm
description: Simulate lead capture, enrichment, and routing rules to demonstrate automated assignment and escalation decisions.

title: Helpdesk triage using synthetic tickets
description: Low-risk tickets auto-execute, high-risk requests pause for helpdesk lead approval. Routing, approvals, and outcomes are logged.

title: Healthcare scheduling with fake patient data
description: AI proposes appointment slots, the clinic manager approves exceptions, and scheduling pauses on high-risk cases. Every slot change and approval is logged.

title: Construction bid evaluation using mock projects
description: Simulate bid packages with mock project data to demonstrate scoring automation and go/no-go decisions.
